verses.text: \w O|strong="H3068"\w* God, \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H1121"\w* heard \w with|strong="H1121"\w* our ears, all our ancestors \w have|strong="H1121"\w* told us \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* work \w that|strong="H1121"\w* you wrought \w in|strong="H1121"\w* their day, \w your|strong="H1121"\w* wonders \w in|strong="H1121"\w* days \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w*,

uprooting \w and|strong="H3117"\w* crushing \w the|strong="H8085"\w* nations, \w then|strong="H8085"\w* planting \w and|strong="H3117"\w* settling \w them|strong="H8085"\w*. \w For|strong="H3117"\w* \w it|strong="H3117"\w* wasn’t \w their|strong="H8085"\w* own sword \w that|strong="H3117"\w* won \w them|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* land,

\w It|strong="H3588"\w* \w was|strong="H6440"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, \w my|strong="H3588"\w* \w king|strong="H6440"\w* \w and|strong="H2719"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w*, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* ordained \w the|strong="H6440"\w* victories \w of|strong="H6440"\w* Jacob.

Through \w you|strong="H6680"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* can thrust back \w our|strong="H6680"\w* foes, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w by|strong="H4428"\w* \w your|strong="H6680"\w* name tread \w down|strong="H6680"\w* \w our|strong="H6680"\w* assailants:

\w for|strong="H8034"\w* \w not|strong="H6965"\w* \w in|strong="H8034"\w* \w my|strong="H6965"\w* bow do \w I|strong="H6862"\w* trust, \w nor|strong="H8034"\w* can \w my|strong="H6965"\w* sword win \w me|strong="H6862"\w* \w the|strong="H6965"\w* victory.

\w Our|strong="H3588"\w* \w victory|strong="H3467"\w* comes \w from|strong="H2719"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, \w and|strong="H2719"\w* confusion \w to|strong="H3808"\w* \w those|strong="H3467"\w* \w who|strong="H3588"\w* hate \w us|strong="H3588"\w*.

\w In|strong="H3588"\w* God \w we|strong="H3068"\w* boast \w all|strong="H3467"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* day long, \w and|strong="H6862"\w* \w your|strong="H3588"\w* name \w will|strong="H3588"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w praise|strong="H3588"\w* forever. \qs Selah\qs*

\w Yet|strong="H3605"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w have|strong="H3117"\w* spurned \w and|strong="H3117"\w* disgraced \w us|strong="H3117"\w*, \w in|strong="H3117"\w* not \w going|strong="H1984"\w* \w forth|strong="H1984"\w* \w with|strong="H3117"\w* \w our|strong="H3605"\w* armies,

\w You|strong="H7725"\w* \w have|strong="H6862"\w* \w let|strong="H7725"\w* \w us|strong="H7725"\w* \w be|strong="H7725"\w* eaten \w like|strong="H7725"\w* \w sheep|strong="H4480"\w*, \w you|strong="H7725"\w* \w have|strong="H6862"\w* scattered \w us|strong="H7725"\w* \w over|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* world,

sold \w your|strong="H5414"\w* \w people|strong="H1471"\w* \w for|strong="H5414"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* pittance, \w and|strong="H6629"\w* getting \w no|strong="H5414"\w* gain \w from|strong="H1471"\w* \w their|strong="H5414"\w* price.

\w You|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H5971"\w* \w made|strong="H7235"\w* \w us|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H3808"\w* butt \w of|strong="H5971"\w* \w our|strong="H5971"\w* neighbours, \w the|strong="H3808"\w* derision \w and|strong="H5971"\w* scorn \w of|strong="H5971"\w* \w all|strong="H4376"\w* \w round|strong="H5971"\w* \w us|strong="H5971"\w*.

\w O|strong="H3068"\w*’er \w the|strong="H7760"\w* world \w you|strong="H7760"\w* have \w made|strong="H7760"\w* \w us|strong="H5439"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* byword, \w the|strong="H7760"\w* nations \w at|strong="H2781"\w* \w us|strong="H5439"\w* shake \w their|strong="H7760"\w* heads.
\w My|strong="H7760"\w* disgrace \w is|strong="H7218"\w* forever before \w me|strong="H7760"\w*, \w my|strong="H7760"\w* face \w is|strong="H7218"\w* covered \w with|strong="H7218"\w* shame,

\w at|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* words \w of|strong="H3117"\w* blasphemer \w and|strong="H3117"\w* scoffer, \w at|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w sight|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* foe \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* vengeful.

\w All|strong="H6440"\w* \w this|strong="H6440"\w* has come \w upon|strong="H6440"\w* \w us|strong="H6440"\w*, yet \w we|strong="H3068"\w* have \w not|strong="H6440"\w* forgotten \w you|strong="H6440"\w* nor falsely dealt \w with|strong="H6440"\w* \w your|strong="H6440"\w* covenant.

\w Our|strong="H3605"\w* heart \w has|strong="H3605"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* turned back, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w our|strong="H3605"\w* steps declined \w from|strong="H3605"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w way|strong="H2063"\w*,

\w that|strong="H4480"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w* \w thus|strong="H3808"\w* should \w have|strong="H3808"\w* crushed \w us|strong="H4480"\w* \w down|strong="H5186"\w*, \w and|strong="H3820"\w* covered \w us|strong="H4480"\w* \w over|strong="H4480"\w* \w with|strong="H3820"\w* gloom, \w in|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* place \w where|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* jackals roam.

\w Had|strong="H3588"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* forgotten \w the|strong="H5921"\w* name \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w our|strong="H5921"\w* God, \w or|strong="H3588"\w* stretched \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w our|strong="H5921"\w* hands \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* god \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w was|strong="H4725"\w* strange,

\w would|strong="H8034"\w* God not \w have|strong="H2114"\w* searched this \w out|strong="H6566"\w*? \w For|strong="H8034"\w* \w he|strong="H8034"\w* knows \w the|strong="H7911"\w* heart \w and|strong="H3709"\w* its secrets.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w in|strong="H3808"\w* \w your|strong="H3045"\w* cause \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H3045"\w* killed \w all|strong="H3045"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* day, \w and|strong="H3045"\w* counted \w as|strong="H3588"\w* sheep \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* slaughter.

Rouse \w yourself|strong="H5921"\w*, \w why|strong="H5921"\w* \w do|strong="H3605"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* sleep Lord? Awake, cast \w us|strong="H5921"\w* \w not|strong="H3588"\w* \w off|strong="H5921"\w* \w forever|strong="H3605"\w*.
\w Why|strong="H4100"\w* \w do|strong="H4100"\w* \w you|strong="H4100"\w* hide \w your|strong="H4100"\w* face, forgetting our stress \w and|strong="H3462"\w* our misery?

\w For|strong="H6440"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H6040"\w* sunk \w down|strong="H6440"\w* \w to|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* dust, \w our|strong="H6440"\w* bodies cling \w to|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w ground|strong="H6440"\w*.
Arise, come \w to|strong="H5315"\w* \w our|strong="H3588"\w* help: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w your|strong="H3588"\w* love’s sake, ransom \w us|strong="H3588"\w*.
